basics.name: Dhanush Biligiri
basics.label: PhD Student
basics.summary: PhD Student in Computer Engineering with expertise in Data Mining, Predictive Modeling, model building, analytics, and visualization. Seeking a full-time role in Machine Learning Analytics, Data Engineering, or Business Analytics

work.name: Elctrical and Computer Engineering Dept., Michigan Technological University
work.summary: Teaching assistant with experience supporting lab instruction, and student guidance in electrical and computer engineering courses

volunteer.summary: Lead organizer for the New York City branch of the People's Climate March, the largest climate march in history.
highlights: Awarded 'Climate Hero' award by Greenpeace for my efforts organizing the march.
Men of the year 2014 by Time magazine

projects.name: Quantum Computing
projects.summary: Quantum computing is the use of quantum-mechanical phenomena such as superposition and entanglement to perform computation. Computers that perform quantum computations are known as quantum computers.
